name: Confusion
effect: When you play Misty's Golduck, choose an opponent. That opponent reveals their hand, then you may copy the effects of a card revealed this way until the end of your turn. This can't Evolve or Learn.
highlight_effect: This stays in play in front of your Trainer. This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

name: Disable
effect: When you play Koga's Venomoth, gain +1 Energy and choose an opponent. Attack: Reveal the top three cards of that opponent's deck, then discard all cards with cost 1 or more revealed this way.
highlight_effect: This stays in play in front of your Trainer. This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

name: Earthquake
effect: When you play Brock's Golem, gain +5 Energy.
highlight_effect: This stays in play in front of your Trainer. This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

name: Erika
effect: You start the game with Erika's Vileplume in your deck.

effect:
+2 Energy and choose an opponent.
Attack: That opponent draws one less card at the end of their next turn.

name: Fire Blast
effect: When you play Blaine's Arcanine, you may destroy a card in your hand or discard pile.

name: Lovely Kiss

name: Thrash
effect: When you play Giovanni's Nidoking, put a Thrash Counter on this, then gain +1 Energy for each Thrash Counter on this.
highlight_effect: This stays in play in front of your Trainer. This is not affected by any effects that do not mention it specifically.

name: Thunder
effect: When you play Lt. Surge's Raichu, gain +1 Energy and choose an opponent. Attack: That opponent discards a card, then puts two cards with cost 0 from their discard pile on top of their deck.
